name: 鬼小队 GhostBros
description:
Ghost Brothers is a rogue-lite where you control a snake made up of multiple heroes, each with their own attacks, passive skills, and classes. Inspired by the auto chess genre, each hero in Snake has a set of classes, and combining enough heroes of the same class can give you additional class bonuses. After buying the same hero from the store, the hero can also be upgraded to a more powerful hero.

Gameplay
Your snake can't stop moving, turn it left or right to steer
Your hero will automatically attack when it is close to an enemy
Group heroes of the same class together to unlock unique class rewards
Clear the arena to get gold coins, which can be used to buy heroes in the store
Buying enough of the same hero can combine them, making them stronger

feature
100+ heroes, each with unique attacks and passives
Over 20 classes each providing stat boosts and modifiers to your snake
100+ passive abilities, each with powerful global effects on your snake
Over 25 levels with increasing difficulty as you progress through the game
Over 30 Steam achievements
